website_summaries.verdict: With the Stream 14, HP once again shows that a Windows laptop for email and online apps can be attractive and inexpensive.
pros: The inexpensive HP Stream 14 is an attractive, lightweight 14-inch Windows laptop with a long battery life and performance good enough for basic productivity and streaming media
Includes 1TB of OneDrive cloud storage and Office 365 Personal for one year
cons: The screen quality isn't good and the keyboard as well as the touchpad are merely passable

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Probably going to return this piece of garbage. Constantly at 100% CPU and 100% Memory. Came full of bloat. It can't handle web browsing. The keyboard layout is awful. I am trying to fix performance by going through the settings and looking for ways to speed it up, but right now it is borderline unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Elyjah Wirth

customer_reviews.title: I should have read the reviews
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when we needed an extra laptop so hubby could work on some Excel spreadsheets. When he ended up not needing it anyway, I figured it would be a good extra laptop in case my Macbook Pro would give up the ghost. Well, turns out there is not much space in this darn thing to even update the operating system so we get the same old message every time. "You need to update. Oops! You don't have enough memory." So I removed everything from Microsoft Office to the games but nope, same message because there just isn't enough space to update the operating system. Period. If I'd known that, I would have been better picking up something else.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Seems to run smoothly. Though I usually avoid downloading ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to run smoothly. Though I usually avoid downloading a lot of extra things on to my laptop to avoid problems I was not impressed to learn that you can not store much of anything on this computer how it comes. I'm not sure why they would even make a computer that cant even handle the updates for itself or from windows for that matter. It asks to use an outside storage device for my updates and I have never ad to do that with any of my previous computers.
customer_reviews.author: tink

customer_reviews.title: It's a good buy for the cost
customer_reviews.text: It's a good buy for the cost. The computer has changed a great color to it, which really makes it stand out from all the black and grey computers in the world. It works very well. No issues so far, but it is not the fastest computer in the world. It does take some time to start up and it does occasionally freeze out of no where. Have had it for a little over a month now and no major issues have occurred. Would definitely recommend for those looking for an inexpensive laptop that don't need a lot of RAM or lightening speed. Would be great for students.
customer_reviews.author: ELeeroy

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Efficient
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Stream and used it for my spring semester in college this past year. It was perfect to take notes, write papers and to do online homework assignments. It does not have that much space but, if you have a Dropbox or some sort of a cloud, you will be all set. It runs fast and efficient. I would reccomend this lightweight computer to anyone who needs a laptop for simple tasks. Thumbs up HP!
customer_reviews.author: Kajsa

customer_reviews.title: Not enough memory to update, even with additional storage
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry to say this laptop is not worth the money. I bought additional storage for it when I purchased it (sd card) and have absolutely nothing additional on the hard drive but except what it came with and even so, it does not contain enough memory for the windows update. Windows has been sending me multiple messages saying the update is required and vital. But I will be unable to update as this machine literally doesn’t contain the 8gb of ram required. I know little about computers and I really wish I had understood that it would be unable to update before I purchased it. It feels like I got scammed.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and she actually liked it (teenager) didnt take long to stop working correctly again...uhg
customer_reviews.text: For my kid, very easy set up. Made me want another new one for myself. Had to down grade original 5 star review. Stopped working in Feb. Cannot handle Windows updates and really slow. Reset to factory settings to get it to function for college student doing most work in cloud storage. I am getting to old to fix computers every other week and to poor to have to keep buying another. You would think it would be full or slow to a crawl within months for the price. Not 1000, but not free either.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Secondary Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this as a main laptop, except for maybe a younger child. Absolutely perfect to bring to class and lectures as it is very light. I get complimented all the time on how vibrant the blue color is - people are shocked when they realize it's not a cover. Loading webpages can be a bit slow at times, but really, that's to be expected. However, there is no buffering for Netflix or other streams (even Twitch!) which is amazing. Not a lot of storage (seriously, read its specs) so keep everything on Google Drive when I use this.
customer_reviews.author: Aceofjades

customer_reviews.title: Writer's Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a writing laptop on the go. It is lightweight and a perfect size for travel. Will be taking it through the airport today and update review afterwards. Battery life is probably 8 hours or so, depending on what your doing. It is a very sleek machine, but I do warn someone looking to use this as a web searching computer, it is slow and if you plan on using for school, maybe get a faster CPU. For the price it was perfect for me, because though I use the internet occasionally on it, its main use is Mocrosoft Office.
customer_reviews.author: Jyanks

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer for my mother thinking it would be great for her to use instead of a desktop.....it was for a few months, but this computer does not have enough space to even update Windows. I have called Microsoft 2 times....they deleted everything they could, but they still could not even update this computer. When I called HP they asked if there was a description saying that this computer was good for every day tasks. I told them that I assumed if they were selling a computer that it would be able to function. Dont buy this....its a scam of a computer and a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Christina B.

customer_reviews.title: The laptop you've been searching for!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new laptop, its was a very good deal and I'm so glad I purchased. I just need it for school assignments and for my online classes,it's perfect! Usually I don't leave reviews but this was worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: R.Monea

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your time with this as you will quickly become ...
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is a complete piece of junk! HP, which is an otherwise very reputable company, should be ashamed of releasing this bottom of the line piece of machinery. The processor is so slow that it can't keep up with my keystrokes. There is so little memory that I can't install Windows updates and the stock OS is inundated with Crapware. Do not waste your time with this as you will quickly become frustrated. Spend the extra money and get a PC that doesn't suck!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Gorog

customer_reviews.title: annoyingly slow
customer_reviews.text: very slow. I assume that is because of all the junk that is preloaded. The 32gb hard drive is not enough to operate this machine. Been trying to download the windows update against spectre for about 30 hours now. Even with a usb drive it still is not working well
customer_reviews.author: d stegman

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my! What a horrible piece of equipment! I bought this "computer" for my kids (5th and 6th grade) so they could work on their projects and let me use mine. It is slooooow, they put so much crappy software in it you can't even update Windows (not even kidding). It works better as a paper weight than anything else. Every time my kids need to use the computer for school, they complain about how slow it is and most of the time end up using mine anyway ... then again, who can blame them, I have a Mac ;)
customer_reviews.author: Marco J DeObaldia

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Was wary about this low cost laptop but WOW...lightweight, fast enough for basic needs, nice and easy speed, pleasantly visible keyboard, decent speakers. So Far I LOVE IT! Mind you I'm 69 so I'm not a game demon so if that's your goal - this wouldn't be your choice but for internet, word processor needs, photos music and netflix it seems to be fine. UPDATE 6months later: So...love the computer but now it's acting up with audio spontaneous interruptions requiring restarts and with all the Windows updates the 32 GB seems to be too little to accomodate. Now I have to upgrade to another brand and higher GB, Oh well you get what you pay for!!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Meehan

customer_reviews.title: basic laptop at a good price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good laptop for the price. It's very basic but works well and was easy to set up. We just needed it for our kids to use for schoolwork. They need to be able to look up some things online, check email, and type and print assignments. It works great for these uses. I was also able to load a math program which didn't take up too much memory space (the big limitation with this laptop). All in all this is a good laptop for basic computer work or for kids. It does basic functions well and is inexpensive enough that I don't have to worry too much about it being damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: The little laptop that could!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this computer for my mother as a christmas gift this year. Her Toshiba is a brick, with an i5 processor... It won't even turn on. THIS HP is an amazing little laptop. Not only is it her favorite color, but it is absolutely perfect for the minimal amount she uses a computer. She doesn't download anything. She doesn't game. She gets coupons and prints them, and she might watch youtube videos. If you are upset about the amount of memory, you can get an external harddrive.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Egbert

customer_reviews.title: Good travel computer
customer_reviews.text: I had to uninstall a ton of bloatware to get it to run faster and it's still slower than my normal HP laptop. I only use it for writing and remote access to my home and work computers when I'm traveling. Microsoft office takes up most of the limited space on the computer and definitely slows it down. The camera quality is also lacking so video chats and conferences are grainy. Plus side--it's light and slim making it ultra portable, and the battery life is amazing which makes it great for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic machine for simple use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my parents as they needed a basic PC to do internet shopping, social media, and other basic stuff like that. For that purpose, it's wonderful. At this price point, you can't expect a blazing fast, top-of-the-line wonder machine, and if you do, that's on you. For simple use, it gets the job done. It has a pretty plastic and cheap feel but the color is vibrant and the keyboard is surprisingly good with nice travel and feedback.
customer_reviews.author: britmar12

customer_reviews.title: It's okay if you don't expect a lot for a laptop
customer_reviews.text: The white keyboard I thought was a good idea. But the very small thin black lettering on the white keyboard is hard to see sometimes. They need to make the lettering thicker and darker. The battery I charge it everyday or I don't have a wireless. I don't use this for much because it isn't the best laptop I've ever had between the poor lettering on the keyboard and the small capability of the battery lifetime I try not to use it. But the price was right at the time.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: The 32GB hard drive makes this PC virtually useless running W10 (what comes on it)
customer_reviews.text: The 32GB hard drive makes this PC virtually useless running W10 (what comes on it). As delivered 27GBs was already used up and with Microsoft's constant updates it has max'ed out the C: drive. Disk compression and disk clean up got my by for a few months but more unstoppable Microsoft updates chewed that up. The HD is not upgradable so I'm stuck. If you're running W10, don't buy a PC with less than 100GB HD is my recommendation
customer_reviews.author: John Pomroy

customer_reviews.title: I bought a five year old pawn shop computer that worked better than this one.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer mainly to lesson plan surf online and type up documents. It has run like a ten year old computer since I got it. Shortly after I purchased it I left teaching and since it ran so slowly I never used it. Over all it’s been used less than 30 times and it’s junk. I once purchased a pawn shop computer as a student on a budget and it worked faster and better than this piece of go-se ever has brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Abi

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my mom as a Christmas gift. It worked well for a little over a year and then there were major problems. The sound constantly goes out and it overheats. It was purchased for her to simply surf the net and nothing else. It can't even perform that tasks without major problems now. I purchased the Square Trade plan for two years and now they are sending me through all these hoops to get a replacement. I just want a product that will perform simple task for more than two years. I should have stuck with Toshiba products.
customer_reviews.author: YannaJ

customer_reviews.title: Really great deal for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Really great deal for what you get. Not much memory but I just ordered a memory stick. Also no cd drive but I just ordered one to plug into the laptop to play or download any cds. All in all it's a great deal and nice color.
customer_reviews.author: Sara kespohl ayotte

customer_reviews.title: Decent laptop for the price point.
customer_reviews.text: Installed Google Chrome when I first received this, after performing the initial set up. Then Windows did an update and I couldn't access the Internet anymore using Chrome or the Microsoft browser. I couldn't configure the firewall, because it was controlled by the factory installed McAfee Live. You need to uninstall McAfee Live using the Windows uninstall and then run the MCPR tool from McAfee to remove the remaining McAfee files. Once I did this, the Internet worked again and I installed AVG. For the price point and after removing Mcafee, this is not a bad laptop. I've only had it one day, so the reliability factor is still open.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: We have only had it for a few weeks, so I will update this in a few months (today is June 1, 2018). For my 13 year old, this is perfect. I don't have to feel to bad if it breaks because of cost (I also bought insurance and since lower price product, insurance is also lower priced). She mainly YouTubes, homework, plays website type games. She loves how light it is and with the right carrying case, this is perfect for young kids and teens.
customer_reviews.author: Ange

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my 12 year old daughter for christmas present , Wow this is a amazing computer for the price , Compact size which is great for a kid and the color is great too, I always love HP products. Pretty fast on streaming . Easy to setup too, Great bargain indeed.
customer_reviews.author: ll

customer_reviews.title: Great school computer
customer_reviews.text: This computer does not have that much storage. I highly recommend that if you plan on downloading plenty of programs and other things, look somewhere else. I strictly use this to write papers and do research for college projects. Pros: cheap, lightweight, easy setup, comes with office, nice display screen (not touchscreen), long battery life Cons: small storage, the color ( little too bright), keyboard ( kinda loud)
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: My wife absolutely love this laptop, the one year free office subscription is a plus! Nice little laptop, I will say this side is the perfect size for a laptop. It's really portable, like and the feeling of the mouse pad and keyboard are premium, this doesn't feel like a cheap laptop. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Eliezer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Junk, blot wear, and not updated.
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with this junk computer. To much blot. Took hours to update, and was not advertised as refurbished, or that it didn't have the 1 year of Microsoft software. Don't buy last minute stuff like this on black Friday. The adds are super deceptive, and you will regret your purchase. Just sad that I bought 2 of these! Should have returned but the time Christmas rolled around it was to late!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Gaskill

customer_reviews.title: I have wasted my money buying this computer
customer_reviews.text: Is been hard to work with this computer, I know the date to return it is passed due, but over the holiday weekend I was doing a midterm and it frozed in the middle of the test, obviously I failed and I had to contact my teacher and finish it with her over the phone, long story short, I have wasted my money buying this computer, now I will have to save money and try to get something of better quality as most of my classes are online. I do not recommend other costumers to buy this computer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I need! I used to own a MacBook Pro, and while this is a totally different realm, all I require is something to browse the Internet and write with. It's a little slower than my old laptop, but for the price, I'm fine with it. Although I didn't purchase this for streaming, I've been streaming quite a few films on it because of the size and convenience. Plus, it's a really cute color. I recommend getting the rainbow keyboard cover with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sär Blackthorn

customer_reviews.title: I do not like that it shuts off so easily
customer_reviews.text: It is as expected. A cheap laptop, but does what is needed. I primarily use it for school work and browsing. It cannot be used for gaming, which is to be expected. I do not like that it shuts off so easily, as in the battery dies after about one day in sleep mode.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Streaming!
customer_reviews.text: It is awesome if you are looking for something to search, or stream. Great for google Drive, sheets, Doc users. It has hardly any internal storage so If you are hoping to save anything to the laptop you are going to be disappointed. Good video playback. I let my kids use it and it has held up well. Battery life is decent it has been good for travel. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very very slow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 1st grader because he had to do online schooling and i was working on main computer. This HP Stream is a lot slower out of the box with only 1 window open than my 5.5 years old MacBook with a few browsers open with multiple windows, and bunch of other apps/programs running. I'm keeping it because of the price and it's enough for 1st grader. But it is very frustrating to work on, even just to open a PDF worksheet. Also, I just now remembered why i pledged years ago that I will never buy Windows computer again.
customer_reviews.author: Olesya Tran

customer_reviews.title: Not enough room to sync with Google Drive
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. I was excited to get this laptop because it seemed to have a lot of features for the money. Unfortunately, it will not hold my 30 GB of files synced from Google Drive. I even installed a SD card in anticipation of this, and it won't sync to the card (apparently a Google Drive thing). So I wish I would have bought a laptop with more room on it. Too late to return it. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Interesting AF

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy This
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for almost a year now. It’s cute and lightweight. The problem is when I started using this laptop to do actual work and not just open it every once in awhile. All I wanted to do was type in Microsoft Word and save it on the Cloud. After a month of getting a message that I couldn’t update despite deleting all kinds of apps that I don’t use, my computer just crashed. It’s tempting to buy this to save money but now I’m out the $250 and have to buy a new one less than a year later. Don’t do it!
customer_reviews.author: E. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little laptop so far
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little laptop so far, 1 month in use. Set up simple. I use this for school, basic Microsoft Office use, email etc., no gaming. No issues with memory so far (as other comments mentioned.) I have even downloaded several programs for use in my courses and am using an online-based course delivery program which includes streaming of video lectures etc. Battery life is excellent, light weight for carrying all day. Super happy with my purchase. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Useless for a college student....
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst computer ever made. I needed a computer for college. It only had to login to the school website, and be able to type papers. It will not let me put Microsoft on it, and it is so slow. I can not even use it to stream web chats. Do not waste your money on this computer!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Its a no from me
customer_reviews.text: You know... I thought I would like this computer a lot more but the thing is its SO PAINFULLY SLOW. And I tried to remove all the unnecessary things on it like bloatware but to no avail. If you need a trusty computer you should probably spend a bit more money because this price shows the quality. I'm dissapointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Erica VanLancker

customer_reviews.title: Keep Looking! Save yourself the headache!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this computer in April 2020 during the Pandemic for my child to do virtually learning. This computer runs very slow. At first I thought, well maybe it’s our internet so I upgraded to Xfinity’s highest internet package and the computer STILL runs slow. I am very disappointed and dissatisfied with this computer!!!!!! Now that fall is approaching my child will need a good reliable laptop to do his studies and unfortunately, I cannot return because it has passed it’s return date. This is so unfortunate and unfair. Please save yourself the headache and don’t even bother buying this .......
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: great price!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are thinking about buying this laptop for college than i highly recommend this laptop. its great for typing papers and doing research projects. i also surf the web. when i first got this laptop i uninstalled unnecessary games i will not be using. i surf the web with laptop and do my online shopping. this laptop is VERY light. the color is also beautiful. you can not beat this price, just because its less expensive than most laptops on the market does not mean that it not as good. i recommended not downloading any unnecessary software and you will be just fine. don't look any further press the buy button !!
customer_reviews.author: Tyquesha

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this computer. Windows 10 takes up too much space, and will continue to grow with every update they release. When I called Microsoft to help when I was out of space with nothing on the computer, they straight up told me HP is making this computer knowing full well how much is needed to operate Windows 10 and choosing to do it anyway. Do your research. It’s an expensive paperweight after 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard has a defect.
customer_reviews.text: I don't typically write reviews, but I was not very happy with this once I received the product, the "m" key only worked about half the time it was pressed. I have asked for a replacement, and I will update this once I receive the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Sturek

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I go this laptop for school. It is all online and all school work is stores in the cloud. I have not downloaded or saved anything to the desktop. The laptop runs so slowly it takes 5-10 minutes for a page to load. Filled with so much bloat that it does not have enough memory to even run windows updates.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Hill

customer_reviews.title: the slowest and worst laptop. Do NOT waste your money like i ...
customer_reviews.text: seriously... the slowest and worst laptop. Do NOT waste your money like i did. I'm stuck with this junk now and will never use it. I bought it to use a simple scheduling app on, but it took too long to even look at the schedule so we had to buy a different computer. I cant get a refund or any help from the seller either.
customer_reviews.author: rebekah thompson

customer_reviews.title: WARNING:  Do not waste your $ on this!  It's terrible.
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is terrible. All we needed it to do was support Facebook, and it doesn't have enough RAM to make Facebook work without terrible frustration. Do not waste your money! Piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: We like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my granddaughter (age 7). She Loves it. Immediatly downloaded Sims 4. She will be able to use this for so many different tasks. Good machine & we really like the color! No issue with the size of Sims (whew!)
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Laptop is Painfully Slow to Load-Buffering Issues with Videos
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this laptop a month ago. I have been trying to find where on Amazon I can help with it. It is very slow to load up. It takes ages for a site to open once clicked upon. Buffering happens quite a bit while trying to watch a video. I have a HP wireless desktop and an iPad and no problems at all with connections, speed etc. This laptop is a disspapointment as it takes forever for any site to open up. Can someone advise me if there's something I need to do, or have I just wasted money on this purchase? Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Lark Logan

customer_reviews.title: Essentially worthless
customer_reviews.text: I read the critiques of the small amount of available memory but I figured as long as I didn't add much there wouldn't be an issue. However, I did not realize that basic and necessary computing functions were accounting for almost all of the space. I also did not realize that I could not upgrade the hard-drive with more memory. Now, less than a year later, I have to buy another laptop -- this one is essentially worthless. Small, light, cute color, but worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Desmond Goss

customer_reviews.title: Isnt touch screen, not good for gaming, but a good little starter laptop
customer_reviews.text: A great cheap little laptop for people who are tight on cash but need a computer. Not great for gaming or running a lot of programs. Maybe I dont know how to use it but the touchscreen doesnt work. Battery life is average, about 2 hours off the charger. I've been using it to help with my live streaming and to write and it's been a great little laptop. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AngelSpartaness

customer_reviews.title: Great for college school work
customer_reviews.text: Its good for just school or just work but, not good for multiply things. I couldn't use it for school and relax (video games or YouTube). the computer holds up well to lots of notes but did need a flash drive not much storage for an online class it worked well just make sure you don't delete a piece of homework and not have it backed up this computer glitched out and I lost homework.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger R Cairl

customer_reviews.title: Regret this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Real piece of junk. I bought this awhile back but forgot to leave a review. Within a couple months of having it I was already having storage issues even though I keep an external drive. I literally had nothing on this computer but it still crashed. Never dropped it or anything like that. You get what you pay for-not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Cay

customer_reviews.title: I bought an HP because I thought it was a good computer, but don’t waste your money on this ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer for my daughter in April 2017, and now the screen doesn’t turn on, and it’s only been used a few times. I bought an HP because I thought it was a good computer, but don’t waste your money on this one!
customer_reviews.author: M. Ringo

customer_reviews.title: Little space but great little inexpensive laptop
customer_reviews.text: 29GB hard drive and 19 is that is the system. Be prepared to buy more space or download nothing extra. Otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sale

customer_reviews.title: Faulty storage design
customer_reviews.text: Great idea in theory but flawed design! since this is not working from the cloud like a Chromebook (which I thought), it still had to be updated as usual, and there is the problem!. ... Hard Drive is way too small for even MS updates to take, and even MS support told me to send it back as it will always encounter problems, so that's what I did. Get a Chromebook or invest in regular Windows laptop if you can...
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T. Doren

customer_reviews.title: Not Functional: No Memory. Don't Waste Your Money.
customer_reviews.text: I read great reviews on CNet about this laptop. Alas that I did not read the customer reviews on Amazon. The laptop filled it's entire tiiiiiny hard drive after downloading updates. I wanted to use it to browse the internet and for word processing: I cannot. There is no space left on the laptop. It simply does not work because of all the bloatware and automatic updates. 0/5, does not function due to lack of memory
customer_reviews.author: Jaron Smith

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away
customer_reviews.text: Worst laptop ever! Something as simple as a PDF will cause this laptop to be slower than molasses and often leads to a whole system crash. Don't even think about erasing the hardrive and resetting because it requires a certain amount of space on the hard drive, which you can't give because the computer crashes before you can delete a file.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Gonzalez Allred

customer_reviews.title: Spend more, not worth the money we paid
customer_reviews.text: Awful. We’ve had this for 7 months and are shopping for a new one. We thought a lower cost laptop would work for email, internet and ligjtnwork on Word docs...nope. The speed is awful, you can’t even type a full email, you have to type word by word. No gaming or video use, I can’t imagine it would even work on this laptop. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Price is right
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was packaged well. It looked clean. Only one surface scratch. The screen does have a black speck that drives me bananas when looking at it for too long. My son says it isn't good for gaming due to no CD-ROM or something. Not a touch screen option. Just a fsw days ago we noticed some glue on the back edge of laptop, meaning this was refurbished product that was not done by professionals. It works, for now, so, I can use it, but I will be vary wary next time I buy a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Echo A.

customer_reviews.title: Can not complete updates for windows :(
customer_reviews.text: Its a basic laptop that helps out with your standard streaming and work needs. the only problem i have with it is the memory. Since it is so low, the constant upgrades needed for Windows cannot be completed. I have a 60G sd card in it for extra memory but it still doesn't help with the updates much at all.
customer_reviews.author: KadoGun_

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Low Price
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but I cannot stress enough how much I hate this laptop. I use it mainly for school, and it is so so incredibly slow. The trackpad is incredibly unresponsive and will frequently stop functioning. When I am trying to type a paper, there is a significant lag between when I type and when it appears. I've had it for less than 6 months and simple tasks, like writing this review, are practically unbearable. It is horrible at streaming TV shows. I usually just watch them on my phone, instead. This is not worth it. At all. Do not get sucked in by the low price.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Pons

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: In a word, garbage. This computer is the biggest headache. It's the slowest operating system I've ever experienced and is full of junk software. Do NOT waste your money. Also purchased because it offered Microsoft office, but that was a lie. Ready to throw this thing out of the window...
customer_reviews.author: Natasha P

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent price and I feel like this is also though ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent price and I feel like this is also though short on memory (one can use an external drive, and a DVD drive would be a good addition), I think that the streaming design also allows the machine to be pretty durable in terms of what kind of "abuse" (within reasoN) this can tolerate, but treat it well, this is not an Apple. I like being able to watch movies and listen to music on my PC as opposed to TV, but that is a matter of preference. The Windows 10 is a great feature,
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ford

customer_reviews.title: Bought for employee travel and so far so good. for price it does what is needed
customer_reviews.text: Bought for employee travel and so far so good. for price it does what is needed. blue color is very nice and gets lots of compliments. Runs quickly even with multiple apps and programs opened simultaneously. Handles high volume processing and is great for remotely working on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Aly M

customer_reviews.title: Will never buy again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and immediately had problem logging in to Windows. Got locked out, spent 5 hours on the phone with tech support to unlock my brand new computer. This computer has hardly any memory left for programs after start up. I also dislike that it has no DVD/CD drive at all!!! I am Very unhappy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Terra Sargeant

customer_reviews.title: Giving me all sorts of issues
customer_reviews.text: Going back to school and using this laptop has given me all sorts of issues. No storage for windows, and it is completely not letting anything download. Not really the greatest laptop, does not want to factory reset because not enough memory which makes no sense at all
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni Dutan

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: My daughter purchased this lap top for her first year in college. Terrible!! It has no memory, and comes with nothing installed on it. The quality is very poor. Looks nice on the outside, but that is it. Don't let it fool you!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my 6 year old to use ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year old to use because they were learning about computers in school, but there is no storage and it is sllloowwwww. We have no-speed wireless and this computer takes forever to connect. You also need a hard drive for storage because you can maybe put 2-3 programs on it before the memory is full
customer_reviews.author: MSchrader

customer_reviews.title: COMPLETE WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use for school, NEVER even got to use it and I can't get the screen to come on, but since I bought it a few months before I started classes and didn't test it out, it's not eligible for a return or for help! Went through all the troubleshooting forums and nothing, plugged into the TV with an HDMI cord and even though the power light in on on the computer the TV can't find the signal and says the computer is off.... COMPLETE WASTE OF MONEY!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt last long
customer_reviews.text: This laptop didnt take long to mess up, nothing works anymore and its only been 2 months since I had it, I tried deleting everything in my files and restarting it to give it more space so it can work again but that only made it worse. It just won't work anymore for apps or watching videos without it glitching and freezing up on me. I regret making this purchase in the first place. You're better off spending lots of money for a better laptop because obviously cheap things suck
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a good college laptop
customer_reviews.text: This is a good college laptop, it has Microsoft free for a year and it is user friendly. For someone that wants a laptop for anything more than college work and streaming this is not the laptop for you, limited space and will get glitchy and slow if you try and run too many apps at once.
customer_reviews.author: Taylir D.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY.... SCAM
customer_reviews.text: By far the worst computer I have ever used. DO NOT GET IT! ITS A SCAM. The computer can’t even run internet explorer without freezing. It has no computing compacity. I got this computer to stream mostly and I still have not been able too. Get ready every time you want to use the computer you have to wait 30 minutes for it to reboot
customer_reviews.author: Jridley934

customer_reviews.title: Slow, Too Much Maintenance
customer_reviews.text: Honestly my chrome book laptop by Acer was better it ran faster and never got a virus. Since I’ve had this computer it’s already had a virus and it runs slow. I’ve never paid for software protection with my chrome book but with this I have to come out of pocket. Yes it’s cute and affordable but so was my chrome book and it worked a lot better than this. Now I just want to get rid of it and get another chrome book. The specs are better! :(
customer_reviews.author: Ayana

customer_reviews.title: Literally the worst computer I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: Literally the worst computer I’ve ever had. Takes a few minutes to load up, very unresponsive to most clicks and such. Lots of pop ups to buy virus protection and update things all the time. Wish I saved myself the money.
customer_reviews.author: Karly Fasth

customer_reviews.title: If i could give this 0 stars i would
customer_reviews.text: BloatWare took up all the space. Do not recommend. The storage space is really the worst part about this laptop. I've had it since last September and it's been a hassle to manage storage. Even after getting a SD card it hasnt helped. it's gotten so bad that after removing and uninstalling everything, I could, it won't do a factory reset. I need more memory to reset and remove everything from it. Now i cant use it anymore. Don't waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Blue!
customer_reviews.text: .You may want to check if you like a lot of memory or not. If not I feel you will love this slower little laptop. The color is a quite Pretty blue! It's easy to handle nicely and to use for school work too. Love the lightweight of it too. I love everything about most HP products. I can't describe how I feel about this because guidelines don't approve.
customer_reviews.author: HelloItsMe

customer_reviews.title: Stay away.
customer_reviews.text: Build quality looks good for the short term I will be owning it. Battery life also seems great. Bottom line, this device is not powerful enough to run windows 10. It has tons of bloatware that can't be removed and is constantly running at 100% with over 145 processes running all the time. It can't handle that. It also does not have enough memory to do the windows updates requested within my six weeks of ownership. It is too slow to be useful.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far. Using it right now. Its very fast. For basic use like email, social media and youtube, its perfect. If you want more storage, you can just get an sd card or flash drive. I have not missed not having a cd reader. Plus, I love the color! I got the blue!
customer_reviews.author: nai_dlc

customer_reviews.title: Pretty slow machine compared to most notebooks - but it ...
customer_reviews.text: OK for a kitchen computer. Pretty slow machine compared to most notebooks - but it is inexpensive. Major flaw is that the internal storage device is very small - 32GB. After loading all of Windows 10 and updates, very little space left for any applications.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Edwards

customer_reviews.title: I also have an HP lap top and they are just a great computer! It works just great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is home schooled and she LOVES this little laptop! The color gives her a feeling of being more of an individual instead of the normal black which seems to be important to many teens...lol.... I also have an HP lap top and they are just a great computer! It works just great!! Great buy! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Patty Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good as a simple laptop, but limited memory....
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. This lightweight laptop is perfect for someone that only uses it for the internet and small documents. It doesn’t have much memory so it’s not for huge projects. The plastic is a thin/little flimsy, which helps keep it light, so you’ll want to keep it protected and don’t want to drop it. All in all, for the price, it’s a good simple laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Allie H

customer_reviews.title: YOU det what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: My HP is a 32 and my windows is 64 not sure how this works. When I got it , Windows changed my D drive to Z but HP fixed it. Now storage is full , Now need help on what I need
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She prefers to store everything on a flash drive anyway and doesn't seem to like a ton of storage (don't ask me
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my mom for Christmas after she destroyed another laptop that she was given, and destroyed a tablet. This one is actually holding up to the abuse. The eMMC drive is quite small, but it works and does what she needs it to do. She prefers to store everything on a flash drive anyway and doesn't seem to like a ton of storage (don't ask me... no idea). It does make her mad due to the speed for her games, but I was not going to buy her a better one with her history!
customer_reviews.author: Sissy C

customer_reviews.title: Makes a wonderful gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop as a gift for my nephew to have during his first year of college. The color is beautiful and the size is perfect. The laptop arrived exactly on time and he loves the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazongirl

customer_reviews.title: It is really good for surfing the web
customer_reviews.text: It is really good for surfing the web, if you need storage, I would suggest getting the 64 gig version are get a laptop with a hard drive with a lot more room. I only needed it to surf the web and use word for a few things. All in all it is a very nice laptop for the money and does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Brunet

customer_reviews.title: Your Basic Computer. Cheap
customer_reviews.text: You don't get much more $220. This thing can surf the web and that's just about it. 32GB is the only thing I can complain about, and that you can't open the laptop with one finger.
customer_reviews.author: Alec

customer_reviews.title: Not worth what i paid for it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer in September and it was working fine until recently. My network adapter keeps disappearing. I have reset the computer each time it happened and it came back...but this last time it didn't come back and now I don't have a computer to use for my online grad school classes
customer_reviews.author: K. S.

customer_reviews.title: CRASHED UPON FIRST USE
customer_reviews.text: I HATED THIS in simple words. It was bought for a family member and crashed at the set up screen. Even after a half hour struggle to set it up, the laptop ran AGONISINGLY SLOW and would freeze upon opening a web page. Was immediately returned and I will be sure to avoid buying HP notebooks on AMAZON in the future.
customer_reviews.author: yuu_uzumaki

customer_reviews.title: A Quality $200 Laptop is Possible!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my HP Stream a few days ago and I'm so excited! It was very easy to setup, super lightweight and it comes with 1 year of Microsoft Office 365 - winning! So far it holds a really good charge. Con - the speakers are on the bottom but I'm able to Bluetooth to my home surround sound system so not really an issue for me. I didn't believe I could find a quality machine for $200 but it is possible with this one. Love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jana Fitts

customer_reviews.title: Love the I year FREE Microsoft Office bonus
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new laptop for classes I am taking. Dropped the one I had which cost 3X as much. This laptop is lighter and much more convenient for my purposes. Fast enough for surfing the web and watching videos. Love the I year FREE Microsoft Office bonus!
customer_reviews.author: deanna

customer_reviews.title: ... daughters to homeschool on and they are both absolute crap. You have to push each button about 10 ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these computers for my young daughters to homeschool on and they are both absolute crap. You have to push each button about 10 times before it registers. They shut down all the time by themselves and sometimes don't even start up. They just can't be counted on at all.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: I was nervous about the purchase but it's been good so far
customer_reviews.text: We needed a computer for basic internet use & my daughter to look up info for school. I was nervous about the purchase but it's been good so far. The set up was quick. The computer's internet connection is slow, but that's not the computer's fault. Our area has very limited choices for internet service :( I am pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.author: Kl

customer_reviews.title: Worthless Laptop
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is crap. It was extremely slow from the beginning and never got any better. It lags and takes forever to load anything. Now, after 5 months, it will not power on or charge. I've tried several troubleshooting suggestions and nothing worked. I would avoid this computer completely.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Memory too small
customer_reviews.text: Horrible computer. Memory way to small for windows 10. Can not update 10 due to lack of space with basically nothing on it.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN F. RADA

customer_reviews.title: after my 1 year warranty expired and I canced microsoft
customer_reviews.text: it sucks because I didn't knew when I bought it that I would have to pay 69.99 in Nov. 2018 it's only a year old and it doesn't work, very upset Briget Williamson
customer_reviews.author: Briget J. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: The worst laptop I have ever owned. I have not even had it for a year and it stopped working! Slow after the first week and most of the windows files are corrupt!
customer_reviews.author: Celeste R

customer_reviews.title: No storage capacity at all
customer_reviews.text: I bought this HP Stream Laptop PC 14” for my 11 year old granddaughter as a birthday gift. There is not even enough storage on the laptop for program updates. I tried to move things to a passport but the hard drive on the laptop is completely full and will not even allow us to move items. I do not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: grandmacherry

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk! Didn’t realize that it was a refurbished laptop. Not user friendly. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Laptop runs great and is very helpful at school and her homework
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves the Stream Laptop. Deleted some of the bloatware and then downloaded Office 2016. Laptop runs great and is very helpful at school and her homework. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rudi

product_meta.title: HP Stream Laptop PC - 14" HD, Intel Celeron N3060, 4 GB RAM, 32 GB eMMC, Office 365 Personal for one year - 14-ax010nr
product_meta.description: Completely connected. Perfectly productive. Get the essential productivity you want, without slowing down. This nimble laptop lets you easily shift from homework workhorse to marathoning your favorite shows. With Windows 10, you’ll experience fast start-ups, a familiar yet expanded Start menu, and great new ways to get stuff done. Audio: 1 x 1/8 inches / 3.5 mm Headphone/Microphone Combo Jack, Integrated Microphone and Integrated Speaker.
feature_bullets: 4 GB DDR3L SDRAM Memory. Processor technology : Intel Turbo Boost Technology
More productive. Windows 10 is the best for bringing ideas forward and getting things done
32 GB eMMC, No Optical Drive. Front-facing VGA webcam with integrated digital Microphone

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars1,283 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
